contact_registration_problem: (Who can I (contact (if I have|for) a registration problem))
registration: (.*(^(?!.*late)(?<!de)(?<!missed to )register(ing)?|(want|how|have|need|do) to register|how (do|can)? i register|(i |one )register|(?<!missed )(?<!late )(?<!belated )(?<!semester )(?<!sose )(?<!wise )registration(?! period)(?! deadline)|sign(ing)? up))
registration_period_sose: (.*((the )?summer semester registration period|(the )?registration period for summer semester|sose registration period|sose registration|summer semester registration))
registration_period_wise: (.*((the )?winter semester registration period|(the )?registration period for (the )?winter semester|wise registration period|wise registration|winter registration|winter semester registration))
